document_data.name: Mosk
document_data.mainbody: '''Mosk''' was a [[bugbear]] who worked for [[Nezznar]] ''circa'' [[1491 DR]]{{Phandelver-time}} and led the [[goblinoid]]s under his employ.
document_data.Description:
The bugbear leader more a jeweled leather eyepatch just for aesthetics, instead of practical purposes, as he had both eyes intact. He also carried 33 [[sp]].

Mosk led the goblinoids that worked towards the Black Spider's cause. He was a given a master key to the complex beneath [[Tresendar Manor]].
document_data.History: In 1491 DR, Nezznar sent Mosk and his contingent of bugbears to Tresendar Manor to keep [[Iarno Albrek]] and the [[Redbrands]] under control.
